fields.name: Intro to Programming
fields.description: Have you ever thought about learning to code but weren't sure how to get started? Maybe you've wanted to market your business or yourself, or have an idea for an online-based startup? Let's meet and explore the fundamentals of programming! You'll learn how to write code, follow best-practices, and develop a mindset that will enable you to quickly learn new technologies. We will start by learning how the web works. We'll then learn programming basics by working with the HTML and CSS languages to create a simple website. From there, we'll learn how to store data in the "cloud" via databases, in order to create dynamic web applications that can process data. Finally, we'll learn how to make your code viewable to others by "deploying" to a web server. The type of website / application we build will be largely influenced by the interests of the attendees, in an effort to make the final product relevant to everyone who attends.

fields.name: Hike Long's Peak
fields.description: We're hiking Long's Peak! Make sure you're comfortable on 4th class terrain.

fields.name: Elk Fest
fields.description: October in Estes Park is now known as "Elktober." Join the transition into fall and celebrate all of Estes Park's natural beauty and wildlife. Elk Fest is the perfect opportunity for an up close wildlife experience and fun for all ages.
